message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think it's a great deal and will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice,  $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I can come down a bit to $180.  I believe this product will be very beneficial to you and it's still a fair price.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $180 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay $150. If you're not able to accept that, I'll need to go with John's offer.
